ygData.subject: Question about pets
ygData.msgSnippet: Im currently a level 6 gnome necromancer on karana server and Ive got a question about pets. Ive heard rumors that your conjuration skill directly affects the
ygData.messageBody:
Im currently a level 6 gnome necromancer on karana server and Ive got a
question about pets. Ive heard rumors that your conjuration skill directly
affects the level of the pet you summon. I was just wondering if there is any
truth to this because Ive found that I summon from level 3-5 and I usually
get each level the same number of times. Just wondering if conjuration is
higher will I summon those level 5 skeletons more often or if they can get
even more powerful.

~Dracor
